# Your PC, your personality: New themes in Store for you

By

- [Giorgio Sardo
– *Vice President, Microsoft Store*](https://blogs.windows.com/windowsexperience/author/giorgio-sardo/)

Forty years ago, Windows set out to empower people to make technology their own. Today, that journey continues with new ways for you to express who you are every time you turn on your PC. We are beginning to rollout a new **Themes** department in the Microsoft Store on Windows, where visitors can quickly find curated and trending themes to customize their Windows devices with a single click. We’ve heard from so many of you that you want your PC to feel like your own. Maybe you’re a gamer who wants to celebrate the latest release, a fan who finds joy in seeing beloved characters each morning, a designer searching for an artfully composed background that sparks creativity every time you log in, or someone who simply wants their desktop to feel fresh and uplifting. The desire to make your device truly yours is universal. Applying a new look is simple: just one click, and your Windows device reflects your personality.

![Image of Themes landing page in the Microsoft Store.](https://blogs.windows.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2025/12/2.-launch-page-1024x683.png)

The new Themes department in the Microsoft Store on Windows hosts over 400 themes, over 35 of which are new to the store, each a collection of wallpapers and accent colors which can change over time, making it easier than ever to personalize your device. Excited about [Sea of Thieves](https://apps.microsoft.com/detail/9pkj8h8nm83m)? We’ve got a Theme for that. National Park fans, we’ve got you covered with [World National Parks](https://apps.microsoft.com/detail/9P8SWK1JMFB4). More of a dreamer? Check out [Ethereal Escapes by PicsArt](https://apps.microsoft.com/detail/9p36www7g06z). Looking to make your desktop whimsy? Apply [Geometric Tales](https://apps.microsoft.com/detail/9n42krpr2r4k) today. If you’re running on vibes, Microsoft Design has captured a variety. With so many to explore, there’s truly something for everyone – no matter your style, mood or inspiration. And it doesn’t stop there. Managing your themes is effortless. Visit Windows **Settings** to view, switch or organize your collection, ensuring your PC always feels fresh and uniquely yours.

Personalization isn’t limited to themes either. The Microsoft Store on Windows has an assortment of **apps** that offer fun ways to customize your PC like [TranslucentTB](https://apps.microsoft.com/detail/9PF4KZ2VN4W9), [Lively Wallpaper](https://apps.microsoft.com/detail/9ntm2qc6qws7) and [Seelen UI](https://apps.microsoft.com/detail/9p67c2d4t9fb).

## Looking ahead

Our vision is to make personalization natural and accessible for every Windows user. The new Themes department is just the beginning step toward making every device a true reflection of its owner. We look forward to hearing your feedback – please submit it via Feedback Hub (WIN + F) under Microsoft Store.

Are you interested in contributing your own theme? We’d love to hear from you: [Microsoft Store Theme Publisher Interest Form](https://forms.office.com/pages/responsepage.aspx?id=v4j5cvGGr0GRqy180BHbR27kMJ9PbFVNhjvHbbGax2BURDQ0OU45WDlCUjhNNjJPS1dZNUY1NkZaVC4u&route=shorturl)
